The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/marcellleal/Documents/scripts/pro.serviceRawFile:
service: aws-lambda-facebook
frameworkVersion: "4"
provider:
  name: aws
  stage: prod
  runtime: python3.11
  region: us-east-1
  deploymentBucket:
    name: escala-in10
  environment:
    ACCESS_TOKEN: ${env:ACCESS_TOKEN}
    IG_USER_ID: ${env:IG_USER_ID}
    S3_BUCKET_NAME: ${env:S3_BUCKET_NAME}
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        # Allow functions to list all buckets
        - Effect: Allow
          Action: 's3:ListBucket'
          Resource: '*'
        # Allow functions to read/write objects in a bucket
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - 's3:GetObject'
            - 's3:PutObject'
          Resource:
            - arn:aws:s3:::escala-in10/*
functions:
  verifyToken:
    handler: handler.verify_token
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /facebook
          method: get

  handleStoryInsights:
    handler: handler.handle_story_insights
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /facebook
          method: post

  processarStoriesEInsights:
    handler: storys.processar_stories_e_insights
    events:
      - schedule:
          rate: rate(1 hour)
          enabled: true
package:
  exclude:
    - .venv/**
    - node_modules/**

plugins:
  - serverless-python-requirements


custom:
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: true
